text: @Nigel_Farage @Lord_Sugar @BorisJohnson This breaks my heart as my mum in law died from Covid-19 on 21 April, my husband is shielding as he has severe breathing problems and pain from kyphoscoliosis and we have been no where since 23 March - for what?? Please can you do something now before many thousands more die????
